query.statement:
SELECT 0 SORT_SEQ ,NULL AS CODE ,NULL AS CODE_NAME ,NULL AS HALL_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL
SELECT 0 SORT_SEQ ,NULL AS CODE ,'전체' AS CODE_NAME ,NULL AS HALL_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT B.SORT_SEQ, A.MEAL AS CODE, B.CODE_NAME
,'' AS HALL_CD
,A.HALL_CD
FROM FSA_HALL_DTL A, SCC_COMMON_CODE B WHERE A.MEAL = B.CODE AND B.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023' AND A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND A.USE_YN = #USE_YN#
AND A.HALL_CD = #HALL_CD#
ORDER BY SORT_SEQ ASC
